mapper.select:
select admin_no as adminNo, admin_id as adminId, admin_pw as adminPw from admin_tbl where admin_id=#{adminId}
and admin_pw=#{adminPw}

select member_name as memberName, member_id as memberId, member_bday as memberBday, member_phone as memberPhone, member_addr as memberAddr, enroll_date as memberEnrollDate from member_tbl
where member_id '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where member_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select p_name as memberName, p_id as memberId, p_dob as memberBday, p_phone as memberPhone, p_addr as memberAddr, apply_date as memberEnrollDate from partner
where p_id like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where p_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select member_name as memberName, member_id as memberId, member_bday as memberBdate, member_phone as memberPhone, member_addr as memberAddr, enroll_date as memberEnrollDate from member_tbl union all select p_name as mname, p_id as mid, p_dob as mdob, p_phone as mphone, p_addr as maddr, apply_date as enrolldate from partner
select member_name as memberName, member_phone as memberPhone from member_tbl where member_id=#{_parameter}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, ng.* from (select notice_g_no as noticeGNo, notice_g_title as noticeGTitle, notice_g_writer as noticeGWriter, notice_g_date as noticeGDate, read_g_count as readGCount from notice_g order by 1 desc)ng) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update notice_g set read_g_count=read_g_count+1 where notice_g_no=#{notice_g_no}
mapper.select: select file_g_no as fileGNo, notice_g_no as noticeGNo, filename_g as filenameG, filepath_g as filepathG from file_g_tbl where notice_g_no = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert:
insert into notice_g values ( notice_g_seq.nextval, #{noticeGTitle}, #{noticeGContent}, #{noticeGWriter}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'), 0 )
select max(notice_g_no) from notice_g
